sentences.english: WANT to set down some general remarks about tramps .
sentences.chinese: 就流浪汉问题，我想谈几点粗略的看法。

sentences.english: What does this sketchy historical record suggest for today's number one power?
sentences.chinese: 上述粗略的历史回顾，对今天的头号强国有何启示呢？

sentences.english: The artist sketched in a few trees to show a vividness in its surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 画家粗略地添加了几棵树，使画面环境颇显生动。

sentences.english: But those details aside,roughly speaking,the following is true.
sentences.chinese: 但这些细节放到一边不管，粗略地说。

sentences.english: Fortunately, that glib question stays unanswered.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，乔布斯对这一粗略的问题并未予以回答。

sentences.english: The bank will do an appraisal , but it will be a cursory one .
sentences.chinese: 银行会出一个评估报告，但却很粗略。

sentences.english: It had a glossed-over feeling with little useful content.
sentences.chinese: 该小节没有什么有用的内容，感觉是被粗略带过了。

sentences.english: Yet scientists have been able to piece together only the sketchiest outlines of that history.
sentences.chinese: 然而，科学家至今仍仅能粗略拼凑出火星的历史。

sentences.english: A particularly inelegant and obviously suboptimal sectionof code that till meets the requirements.
sentences.chinese: 直到满足要求的明显粗略或者次优的代码带。

sentences.english: They are rough order of decreasing relevance.
sentences.chinese: 它们仅是以关联性渐减的粗略次序排列。

sentences.english: In all of these, the estimates are fairly coarse.
sentences.chinese: 所有的这些评估都是粗略的。

sentences.english: He roughed in the curves he intended his pattern to take.
sentences.chinese: 他粗略地勾出了他设想中图案的曲线。

sentences.english: Review the plan should be combined with the length, rough fitting.
sentences.chinese: 复习计划要长短结合，粗略相宜。

sentences.english: The final chapter, on the status quo of Bashu Paifang and protection were also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 最后一章，对巴蜀牌坊的现状与保护作了粗略探讨。

sentences.english: We managed to piece together the truth from several sketchy accounts.
sentences.chinese: 我们从几方面粗略的说法中设法弄清了真相。

sentences.english: The subject has been referred to cursorily in the preface.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题在序言中已粗略地提到了。

definition: in general/more or less/in rough terms/basically/on the whole/overall situation/the big picture/(Tw) remains (of a dead person)
to convert/conversion/(in accounting, referring to currency conversion) translation
